name: Fimfiction Story Scroller
description: Reduces the height of Fimfiction's frontpage by adding the ability to scroll the new stories, updated stories, and popular stories lists.
additional_info:
Version 1.6
Added Firefox-compatible scrollbar styling so that Webkit users don't get to be the only ones to enjoy thin scrollbars.

Version 1.5
Removed horizontal scrollbar in the popular stories list.

Changelog:

Version 1.4
Long chapter lists are now scrollable, cleaned up scrolling code to remove unnecessary horizontal scroll bars.

1.3
Made scrollbar background transparent, making things easier on the eyes when using Fimfiction's night mode, fixed minor overlap problems with browsing buttons.


1.2
- Changes: Fixed popular stories scrolling on Microsoft Edge using Tampermonkey.

1.1
- Changes: Made related stories box on story/chapter pages scrollable too.

1.0
- Initial release
